name: Pika Ball Shooter
description:
Pika Ball Shooter is an addictive bubble shooter game with 500+ puzzles for children, toodlers, kids. Join millions now in the best free bubble shooter game ever!
Features
- More than 500 magic levels to complete! And more puzzles are coming soon.
- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
- Pop bubble with extension line.
- Bubble pop with lightning bubble.
